list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Water dribbled out of the tap.

list_definition.definition: (of a baby etc) to allow saliva to run from the mouth

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The baby had dribbled food down its chin.

list_definition.definition: in football, basketball, hockey etc to move the ball along by repeatedly kicking, bouncing or hitting it

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He dribbled the ball up the field.
A dribble ran down his chin.
